programme.title: Crank: High Voltage
programme.desc: In a chase through Los Angeles, Chev pursues a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: When a gangster is injured by The Punisher, he swears revenge and recruits an army of dangerous men.

programme.title: Gamer
programme.desc: In a future mind-controlling game, death row convicts are forced to battle in a 'Doom'-type environment.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Nine criminals are placed on an island. Only the last person alive in 30 hours leaves the island.

programme.title: Source Code
programme.desc: An army pilot must travel through time using the 'Source Code' in order to identify a ruthless bomber.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke and Emma Watson star in this thriller about a small town crime that unmasks a horrifying mystery.

programme.desc: A family man finds his world turned upside down when his wife is convicted of murdering her boss.

programme.desc: A hedge fund magnate trying to sell his trading empire makes an error and turns to an unlikely person for help

programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: A wild one-night stand plunges a sports agent into a deadly cat-and-mouse game with a police detective.

programme.title: Alice, Darling
programme.desc: A woman's identity and friendships are tested as she breaks free from her psychologically abusive boyfriend.

programme.title: A Vigilante
programme.desc: After escaping her dangerous husband, a woman turns avenger to help victims of domestic abuse.
